name: Wizard Spider
description: Wizard Spider is a highly sophisticated cybercrime group believed to be behind some of the most notorious ransomware attacks, including Ryuk, Conti, and TrickBot. The group is well-resourced and operates a Ransomware-as-a-Service (RaaS) platform, targeting large organizations worldwide. Wizard Spider is known for its advanced tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs), including the use of double extortion and extensive reconnaissance before attacks.
